name: Avenging Brothers - Lost Warriors Gone Wild
name_original: Avenging Brothers - Lost Warriors Gone Wild
description:
Test your skills as you run the distance. Jump, run upside down, even attack strange warriors. This is dangerous territory! Collect coins while running along the terrain. Choose from several characters and several worlds. This is your mission. You decide. Imagine running for your life while listening to cool music and dodging or slicing obstacles. Exciting fun and challenging.

HOW TO PLAY:

Press the lower left of screen to jump. Hold down press to jump higher. Press the lower right to slice. Collect coins to unlock new warriors and worlds.

-Amazing Graphics
-Cool Sounds
-Exciting Warriors

Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!

EXCITING FUN!!

Download ‘Avenging Warriors’ now and save the Kingdom!!!
